name: TextMaker Document
summary: Learn about .TMDX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: TMDX files are saved in a proprietary format and are the main file type associated with TextMaker, which is similar to Microsoft Word. TMDX files are used similarly to how .DOC and .DOCX files are used by Microsoft Word. A TMDX file is created to store a spreadsheet and can be closed and reopened for further editing.

TMDX files may be created from a .TMV and TMVX templates or DOC and DOCX documents. They may also be converted to various formats in TextMaker, including .PDF, DOC, DOCX, .DOTX, .TMD, TMV, TMVX, .ODT, .PSW, and .RTF.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
